post:
_Offer approved by Administrator:_

**What is WHMAMP?**
WHMAMP is a Plugin that is developed for creating Alpha Resellers, Master Resellers and WHM Resellers. WHMAMP is developed for cPanel/WHM servers.  

**Smart Features:**  

**WHMCS Module** - WHMCS module integration to create Alphas, Masters & WHM Resellers.  
**Automated Update**s - In-build auto-update feature makes the product to get updates automatically.  
**Security** - Integrated firewall that drops root access just in case is requested.  
**Auto Block System** - Integrated auto-suspend feature for Alphas, Masters & Resellers.  
+ more to come with every new update.  

**_Root/Administrator:_**  

**Create Alpha Reseller  
Create Master Reselle**r  
Edit Alphas & Masters  
Upgrade Reseller to Master  
Upgrade Master to Alpha  
Downgrade Alpha to Master  
Downgrade Master to Reseller  
Terminate Alpha & Masters  
Suspend Alphas & Masters  
Monitor Alphas & Masters Usage  
Move Masters between Alphas  
Move Resellers between Masters  
Add Super Alpha Users  
Reseller ACL list selection  



**_Alpha Reseller Features:_**  

**Create Master Reseller  
Create WHM Reseller**  
Edit Masters and Resellers  
Upgrade Reseller to Master  
Upgrade cPanel to Reseller  
Downgrade Master to Reseller  
Downgrade Reseller to cPanel  
Terminate Masters & Resellers  
Suspend Masters & Resellers  
Monitor Masters & Resellers Usage  
Move Resellers between Masters  
Move Domains between Resellers  



**_Master Reseller Features:_**  

**Create WHM Reseller**  
Edit WHM Resellers  
Upgrade cPanel to Reseller  
Downgrade Reseller to cPanel  
Terminate Resellers  
Suspend Resellers  
Monitor Resellers Usage  
Move Domains between Resellers  


**License Price:**
